Requirements.name: Requirements Time
Requirements.description: The uncertainty is expected to be resolved as soon as the requirements are defined.
Requirements.exampleText: Uncertainty related to confidentiality requirements or security policies.

Design.name: Design Time
Design.description: The uncertainty is expected to be resolved as soon as the software system is designed.
Design.exampleText: Uncertainty related to architectural design decisions, the system structure, or components.

Realization.name: Realization Time
Realization.description: The uncertainty is expected to be resolved as soon as the software system or parts of it are implemented and deployed.
Realization.exampleText: Uncertainty related to implementation or deployment details.

Runtime.name: Runtime
Runtime.description: The uncertainty is expected to be resolved as knowledge is gained from testing and system operations, or not at all.
Runtime.exampleText: Uncertainty related to runtime properties that can be inspected using dynamic analysis, e.g., using monitoring, or profiling.
